thread.title: 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series

author: senh
title: 'Vampire Academy' author Richelle Mead to launch new series
text: BING NEWS: 'Vampire Academy' Author Richelle Mead to Launch New Series "Vampire Academy" author Richelle Mead is giving life to a new series. Penguin Young Readers Group announced Monday that Mead's "The Glittering Court" will launch April 12.
